snippet.title: Battleheart Release Trailer
snippet.description: This is our latest gaming creation, from the folks who brought you Zombieville USA and OMG Pirates! for the iOS.  Battleheart is a unique blend of RPG and real-time strategy games, distilled into pocket-sized form.  It's definitely our most ambitious project to date, and we hope our fans will enjoy it when it's released in February.  As of this writing, its currently awaiting approval from Apple, and should be released any day now!  Thanks for watching!
